### [Chess Dashboard](https://github.com/nvarabioff/chess-dashboard)
_March 2025_

<div id="proj2-content" class="collapse">
For an individual school project, I wanted to visualize the entire history of chess games I have played on the free online chess platform [lichess](https://lichess.org/). I created a dashboard using Shiny to visualize my games.
